resources.string: Hello World, FortunetellingActivity!
Fortunetelling

NO.1 BEST
 Hexagram:A tired dragon get water who was good luck, are on the brow of festivity. Hope all are wishful to seek backwards fortune gradually higher.
 Fortune:Soaring, fame and fortune come, should seize the opportunity to achieve success.
 Love:Both sides try to be brave, should communicate more accommodating.
 Health:Disease progression, should be carefully nursed back to health, pay attention to head, brain, bone marrow lesion.

NO.2 BEST
 Hexagram:Hungry tiger is happy to get food, seeking fame and fortune should be upward development, when going out will have good luck and won't encounter dispute.
 Fortune:All things should not be radical, it should not be action to wait the right opportunity.
 Love:Radical may lose but slowly will advanced,Haste makes waste.
 Health:Serious condition, the abdomen, stomach, muscle and other chronic diseases.

NO.3 WORST
 Hexagram:The wind mess the hair, but can not see the head,confused and have some troubled, slowly to do will have some clues,do not rush things.
 Fortune:Have some difficulties,should solve it step by step,the difficulty will be resolved after.
 Love:Emotional develop by resistance, should keep the faith, overcome all difficulties.
 Health:Disease in the stomach, foot, or urinary system, should not be taken lightly.

NO.4 WORSE
 Hexagram:Guilty villain,hope for the wealth in vain,marriage may be broken, travel and trade will meet some gossipy.
 Fortune:Initially confused and do not know the direction, be patient to wait the good time, always listen to the opinions of others, then will have good luck.
 Love:Lack of courage and determination.
 Health:The disease is unknown, repeated intractable. The stomach, ascites of the disease and infectious diseases.

NO.5 BEST
 Hexagram:Pearl buried deep for a long time, no light until now. Suddenly the wind blows to the soil, naturally exposed again.
 Fortune:Should wait the right time to do things, if radical will encounter dangerous.
 Love:Emotional development at first disappoint, we must be patient, then will see the success.
 Health:Delay the disease should be carefully treated, for the head and chest, urinary system diseases.

NO.6 GOOD
 Hexagram:The two men refused to surrender fight, and require assertive.travel and trade will be blocked, will meet business partners.
 Fortune:Inconsistent with the desire of things,villain harm,prevent trap.
 Love:Erratic,frequent quarrels,prevent villain breaking.
 Health:Serious condition, for the waist, blood, urinary system, the head disease.

NO.7 BETTER
 Hexagram:Soldiers were ordered to go to war,Riding a good horse to archery,very accurate archery shooting,and shoot the money to make you happy.
 Fortune:Have some difficult, everything should act formally.Avoid arbitrary and opportunistic, beware of a potential enemy.
 Love:Women become strong and men become weak,to be vigilant against sex doom,may have polygonal relationship,difficult to propose marriage.
 Health:Critical conditions, beware of the heart or abdominal tumor.

NO.8 BEST
 Hexagram:Downwind sailing,and God still help the wind. Forward without effort, go anyway you will have good luck.
 Fortune:May have promoted smoothly,all matters relating to quick-fix,not too much hesitation.
 Love:Two people like each other, good match.
 Health:New disease should fast for medical treatment, chronic illness is dangerous, as the abdomen, kidney, ear and other diseases.

NO.9 WORSE
 Hexagram:Thick clouds but hardly to rain,look forward the far away people, but not come back,travel and trade are effortlessly,in vain to seek marriage.
 Fortune:Fortune over and over again, there is a war of words, but difficult to solve the short term, be patient, wait good time.
 Love:Differences of opinion, or being against elders.
 Health:Serious illness, pay attention to the liver and gallbladder, head lesions.

NO.10 BETTER
 Hexagram:Beautiful birds come out from the cage fortunately,away from the disaster and show its power,one day successful and fly away to any directions.
 Fortune:First work hard then comfortable,first shock and then stability,everything should not be radical,get along with others peacefully,near misses.
 Love:Two people like each other but a lot of difficulties, sincerity can affect even metal and stone.
 Health:Disease was heavy, but also more attention to conditioning, be care about head, mouth, lung and other diseases.

NO.11 BEST
 Hexagram: Have good luck,great good fortune to seek hope for wealth,travel and trade are wishful,gossipy is no harm.
 Fortune:Everything go smoothly,all matters relating to internal demand, not outside,prevent joy turning to sorrow.
 Love:Fall in love, happy match concluded.
 Health:Adverse chronic illness, attention intestine, lung and head disease.

NO.12 WORSE
 Hexagram:Tigers fall into the trap and unspeakable,easily forward difficult to back,different aspirations and their own ideas,have been implicated in disease and gossipy.
 Fortune:Discord with elder,everything is not very well,we have to be patient, the situation will improve.
 Love:Refuse others far away, with signs of discord and parting.
 Health:Disease in the brain, lungs and stomach, etc. beware of cancer.

NO.13 BETTER

 Fortune:Auspicious working with others,peaceful with others and be promoted by elders.

NO.14 BETTER
